.. _fluidtypo3-vhs-format-case:

==========================================
format.case ViewHelper `<vhs:format.case>`
==========================================


Case Formatting ViewHelper

Formats string case according to provided arguments.


.. _fluidtypo3-vhs-format-case_arguments:

Arguments
=========


.. _format.case_string:

string
------

:aspect:`DataType`
   string

:aspect:`Required`
   false
:aspect:`Description`
   String to case format

.. _format.case_case:

case
----

:aspect:`DataType`
   string

:aspect:`Required`
   false
:aspect:`Description`
   Case to convert to
